markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cadence Call](/Feats.aspx?ID=6356) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=541" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=606" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 205 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Marshal](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=254)

**Frequency**
once per minute

**Prerequisites**
[Marshal Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6351)

</column>

---

You call out a quick cadence, guiding your allies into a more efficient rhythm. Each willing ally in your marshal’s aura is [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=89) until the end of their next turn, and they can use the extra action only to [Stride](/Actions.aspx?ID=2305). If an ally uses this extra action, at the end of its turn that ally becomes [slowed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=92) 1 until the end of its following turn.

<title level="2">Cadence Call leads to...</title>
[Tactical Cadence](/Feats.aspx?ID=6362)
name: Cadence Call
